= //{{伟大演员气势如虹}}//

= **模因接种完毕。欢迎，已授权的人员。**
@@ @@

[[div class="box" style="border:5px solid #5f009e; border-radius:5px; background-color:#100917; padding: 1em;"]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
嗨！:)
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jaksmile.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
你好呀。为这个并不……很有个性的外表道歉。在某种程度上，似乎连神都要受到[[[licensing-guide|你们宇宙的规则]]]的约束。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/rallsmile.png width="130px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
不过，也不要误会了——我们还是你以为的那两个人！或者，至少，我们希望你知道我们是谁？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jakhappy.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
那就澄清一下可能会有的困惑吧——我还是[[*user Ralliston]]。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/ralltalking.png width="130px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
而我是[[*user JakdragonX]]！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jakhappy.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
那么，你现在可能在想：“这是什么？”
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/rallsurprised.png width="130px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
这是我们共享的作者页中心，列出了我们所有的合著作品！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jakangry.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
“但Jak和Ralliston啊，”你问道，“为什么要做这么个页面呢？你们不是已经各自有了[[[jakdragonx-rage-collection|自己的]]][[[ralliston-s-authorpage|作者页]]]了吗？”
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/rallglitch.png width="130px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
确实！而且我们也很喜欢它们。然而，因为我们合著了很多——真的很多//很多//——我们觉得可以做一个类似于合著作者页的东西。没有规则说我们不能这么做，而且你知道有句话是怎么说的吗：“科学并不是关于‘为什么？’，而是关于‘为什么不？！’”
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jaksmile.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
……你刚才是他妈玩了个《传送门2》梗吗？
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/ralltalking.png width="130px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
……可能吧。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jaksad.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
别理我朋友那匮乏的社交技能，我想正式欢迎你来到这个恰如其名的页面“当前事件：JakdragonX & Ralliston”，我们将在这里展示我们共同创作的文字。
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/rallsmile.png width="130px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-left: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 10pt; background-color:#321f4; font-family: "Microsoft Sans Serif"; border: #321f47 4px solid; background:#969696; text-align: left; padding: 2px 10px;"]]
玩得开心！
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston/jaksmile.png width="130px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

-----
[[=]]
[[size 140%]]**SCP文章**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
-----

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[SCP-6555|SCP-6555 — 曾引潮汐之物]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“我们离寻到丢失之物更近了。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们合著**
~~~~~

[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[SCP-643|SCP-643 — 美味巧克力]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“她的血肉救了我们。”}}
~~~~~
**由佚名原作，由我们合著重写**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[SCP-6292|SCP-6292 — 饮酒不收人]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“你他妈在这给老子日蛋吗？”}}
~~~~~
**由我们合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[SCP-6372|SCP-6372 — 独块巨石]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“从目前可获取数据中，关于SCP-6372唯一能推断的是它并非原生于目前所处的行星。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[SCP-7272|SCP-7272 — 伊斯猫布尔（非科斯坦丁堡）]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“从目前可获取数据中，关于SCP-6372唯一能推断的是它并非原生于目前所处的行星。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user Aftokrator]]、[[*user Guaire]]、[[*user Jack Waltz]]、[[*user LightlessLantern]]、[[*user LORDXVNV]]、[[*user oritiefling]]、[[*user Trotskyeet]]以及[[*user Vivarium]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

-----
[[=]]
[[size 140%]]**故事**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
-----
[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[Inadvertent Neolinguistics]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{"I pod ye s a pTawtatxbabdbtird to the t meimestwlt throwbii of to go"}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user HarryBlank]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[i-hub|我，中心页（愚人节）]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“我不喜欢被困在酸浴里。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user basirskipreader]], [[*user Calibold]], [[*user The_Spider_Queen]], [[*user Dysadron]], [[*user Ellie3]], [[*user Elenee FishTruck]], [[*user Esperanza_Cai]], [[*user gee0765]], [[*user Hexick]], [[*user Ihnaaimc]], [[*user JackalRelated]], [[*user Joreth]], [[*user Limeyy]], [[*user Liryn]], [[*user Lt Flops]], [[*user Machen2]], [[*user Nykacolaquantum]], [[*user Oboebandgeek99]], [[*user PeppersGhost]], [[*user Placeholder McD]], [[*user pr0m37h3um]], [[*user Sherf]], [[*user Snapdragon133]], [[*user UnnaHuz]] [[*user 927VVG]], 以及 [[*user Westrin]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[Four Knights' Tango|四骑士之探戈]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“哦，他呀？他谁也不是。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user Trotskyeet]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[Epitaphs of Mine|我的墓志铭]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“从我年轻的时候起，我就是一名微不足道的流浪歌者。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[Rate My Director|]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“不是研究员？请记得去看一看我们的同行我给**##red|[# 指挥官打打分]##**还有**##green|[# 我给图书管理员打打分！]##**”}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user Aftokrator]], [[*user AnActualCrow]], [[*user Cyvstvi]], [[*user DodoDevil]], [[*user Dr Trintavon]], [[*user Dysadron]], [[*user EmotionalEntropy]], [[*user Fishish]], [[*user GremlinGroup]], [[*user Grigori Karpin]], [[*user HarryBlank]], [[*user Its a Bad Idea]], [[*user J Dune]], [[*user LightlessLantern]], [[*user Limeyy]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user MrBadFellow]], [[*user OriTiefling]], [[*user Pedagon]], [[*user PlaguePJP]], [[*user pr0m37h3um]], [[*user R4_EX]], [[*user Rounderhouse]], [[*user Snapdragon133]], [[*user stephlynch]], [[*user stormbreath]]以及[[*user Trotskyeet]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[=]]
[[size 140%]]**GoI格式**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
-----
[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[project-proposal-2012-120|]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“表演将会在我的尖叫声中结束。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[The Bathrooms Wiki]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“欢迎来到厕室。”}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user AnActualCrow]], [[*user Deadly Bread]], [[*user DodoDevil]], [[*user Dysadron]], [[*user Elenee FishTruck]], [[*user Fishish]], [[*user GremlinGroup]], [[*user Grigori Karpin]], [[*user HarryBlank]], [[*user Its a Bad Idea]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user PlaguePJP]], [[*user R4_EX]], [[*user ROUNDERHOUSE]]以及[[*user Trotskyeet]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[=]]
[[size 140%]]**其他**[[/size]]
[[/=]]
-----
[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[ongoing-incident-jakdragonx-ralliston|]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{你为啥还需要引语？你不就在这里吗！}}
~~~~~
**由我们合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 4px #321f47; width: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:1em; box-shadow: 2px 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[=]]
[[size 115%]]**[[[GASLIGHT, GATEKEEP, GIRLBOSS Hub|]]]**[[/size]]
~~~~~~
{{“是组织获胜，最终将死那永不灭亡的野兽麦布，还是星光再次获得成功，让她的回归变为现实？”}}
~~~~~
**由我们和[[*user Trotskyeet]]合著**
~~~~~
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

author: Esperanza_Cai
